means: 争吵，口角
反目
抱怨…的原因（理由）
[史]方镞箭，角镞箭
争辩，争吵
不同意
挑剔
责备，埋怨

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"辩论，争论，说理"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: argue, quarrel, debate, dispute, discuss, reason
means: argue ：指提出理由或证据为自己或自己一方的看法或立场辩护，着重说理、论证和企图说服。
quarrel ：指两人之间或两个团体之间不友好的、吵吵嚷嚷地大声争论某事，尤指"吵嘴、吵架"。
debate ：侧重指意见等对立的双方之间正式或公开的争辩。
dispute ：侧重对分歧进行激烈或热烈的争论或争辩，带一定感情色彩，常隐含"各持已见"或"争论不休"意味。
discuss ：最常用词，指就某一或某些问题表明观点、看法等，以便统一认识，解决问题。
reason ：指据理力争以说服对方或求得对问题作更深入的研究。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这组名词均有"争执，不和"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: controversy, argument, conflict, debate, dispute, quarrel, strife
means: controversy ： 侧重指深刻的意见分歧，多指对引起广泛兴趣或非常重要的问题的辨论。
argument ： 指辩论双方均以事实或理由来说服对方的辨论。
conflict ： 指双方坚持已见、互不妥协，怀有敌意的争论，多暗示分歧极为严重，有时用语言无法解决，只得诉诸武力。
debate ： 通常指经过仔细组织和计划的个人或团体之间的辩论。
dispute ： 普通用词，侧重指长时间，言词激烈，针锋相对的争辩。
quarrel ： 普通用词，既可指言词激烈的争吵，也可指温和的言词上的不和。
strife ： 指因不可缓和的矛盾而引起的争吵或斗殴。

sentence.Network_en: They could quarrel quite legitimately with some of my choices.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们大有理由不同意我的一些选择。

sentence.Network_en: The monarchists are a small fringe group who quarrel fiercely among themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 君主主义者是一个内部争吵激烈的非主流的小团体。

sentence.Network_en: It could have happened during a quarrel between them over Naomi.
sentence.Network_cn: 这件事可能是在他们为娜奥米争吵的过程中发生的。

龙门客栈 - Tuesday, August 30, 2005 Entries ... play with 把玩, quarrel with 与某人争吵, reason with 与某人评理.
幼儿园常用口语 ... 12 Don't make any noise. 不要吵. 13 No quarrelling. 不要吵闹. 14 No fighting. 不要打架.
she works speaks the fact , to speak the truth , speaks the law , reasonable also legitimately mediated the massive family quarrel .她工作中讲事实、讲道理，讲法律，合理又合法地调处了大量家庭纠纷。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'reason for disagreement with a person'): from Old French querele, from Latin querel(l) 'a complaint', from queri 'complain'
Middle English: from Old French, based on late Latin quadrus 'square'. Compare with quarry

entry.def: A quarrel is an angry argument between two or more friends or family members.

example.ex: I had a terrible quarrel with my other brothers...
example.tran: 我跟其他几个兄弟大吵了一架。

example.ex: It could have happened during a quarrel between them over Naomi.
example.tran: 这件事可能是在他们为娜奥米争吵的过程中发生的。

entry.def: Quarrels between countries or groups of people are disagreements, which may be diplomatic or include fighting.

example.ex: ...New Zealand's quarrel with France over the Rainbow Warrior incident...
example.tran: 新西兰和法国关于“彩虹勇士号”事件的争端

example.ex: The quarrel between the Serbs and the Croats is old and bitter.
example.tran: 塞尔维亚人和克罗地亚人之间的争斗由来已久，而且非常激烈。

entry.def: When two or more people quarrel, they have an angry argument.

example.ex: At one point we quarrelled, over something silly...
example.tran: 我们一度为一件愚蠢的小事吵了起来。

example.ex: My brother quarrelled with my father.
example.tran: 我哥哥和父亲吵了一架。

entry.def: If you say that you have no quarrel with someone or something, you mean that you do not disagree with them.

example.ex: We have no quarrel with the people of Spain or of any other country...
example.tran: 我们和西班牙以及其他国家的人民并无分歧。

example.ex: She had no quarrel with much of what had been said at dinner.
example.tran: 晚饭上所说的话她大部分都没有意见。

entry.def: If you say that you would quarrel with someone or with something that they have said, you mean that you disagree with them.

example.ex: I would quarrel with you on that figure...
example.tran: 在那个数字的问题上，我并不认同你的看法。

example.ex: While some of his peers might quarrel with the title, his credentials remain impressive.
example.tran: 尽管他的一些同龄人也许并不认同这个称号，他的资历仍然令人钦佩不已。

means.word_mean: 2. an arrow that is shot from a crossbow; has a head with four edges

means.word_mean: 争吵, 不和, 口角

sentences.en: The quarrel resulted in his mother leaving the house.
sentences.cn: 争吵导致了他母亲离家出走。

sentences.en: That is part of my quarrel against them.
sentences.cn: 那是我与他们争吵的部分原因。

sentences.en: I know you've been quarrelling a good deal lately.
sentences.cn: 我知道你们近来时常吵嘴。

sentences.en: You can't quarrel with the decision of the court; it's very fair.
sentences.cn: 你不能反对法院的判决, 它判得很公正。

jushi.english: I have no quarrel with his opinion.
jushi.chinese: 我对于他的见解没有争议。

jushi.english: I have no quarrel with him.
I have no quarrel with what the minister says.
jushi.chinese: 我没有理由不同意部长所说的。
